title: Sustainable Bioplastic Straws Made from Potato Starch
body: In this respect, researchers in Korea have created a bioplastic alternative to plastic straws. According to the team's article published in ACS Omega, these new straws are stronger than plastic and more durable than paper. Dickens O. Agumba, Duc Hoa Pham, and Jaehwan Kim created the straws by combining potato starch and lignin - a polymer ...
